org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql
Class AeDataSource

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.sql.DataSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeDebugDataSource, AeJNDIDataSource
public abstract class AeDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.sql.DataSource

Convenience class to centralize access to JDBC data sources. There is a static member (e.g., MAIN) for each data source in the system. Each such instance is a subclass of AeDataSource that constructs the real JDBC data source as needed.

getCommitControlConnection

public java.sql.Connection getCommitControlConnection()
                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns connection with auto-commit disabled. Callers must explicitly call Connection.commit() to persist.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getCommitControlConnection

public java.sql.Connection getCommitControlConnection(boolean aVerifyFlag)
                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns connection with auto-commit disabled. Callers must explicitly call Connection.commit() to persist.

Parameters:
aVerifyFlag - Verify that Connection.commit() or Connection.rollback() is called.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getTransactionManagerConnection

public java.sql.Connection getTransactionManagerConnection(boolean aCommitControlOnFallback,
                                                           boolean aVerifyFlag)
                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns a connection from the transaction manager if the current thread is already participating in a transaction. Otherwise returns a new connection or a commit control connection.

Parameters:
aCommitControlOnFallback - if the current thread is not participating in a transaction, then return a commit control connection instead of a new connection.
aVerifyFlag - Verify that Connection.commit() or Connection.rollback() is called for commit control connections.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getTransaction

protected IAeTransaction getTransaction()
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
Convenience method to return transaction for current thread, translating AeTransactionException to SQLException.

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of this data source object.

getSetTransactionIsolationLevel

public boolean getSetTransactionIsolationLevel()
Returns value of parameter that controls whether to set transaction isolation level on connections. The default is true, which is overridden for Oracle, because Oracle does not support the read uncommitted transaction isolation level.

getSQLConfig

public AeSQLConfig getSQLConfig()
Returns the SQL configuration.
